Title: Relates to the taxation of property owned by a cooperative corporation
Summary: Relates to the taxation of property owned by a cooperative corporation in the towns of Bolton, Horicon, Thurman, Queensbury, Lake George, and Warrensburg.
LawCode: Amd ยง581, RPT L; amd ยง339-y, RP L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law and the real property law, in relation to the taxation of property owned by a cooperative corporation
